intro: Schlagintweitia huteri subsp. lantoscana, commonly known as the Lantoscana subshrub, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the family Geraniaceae and is characterized by its upright growth habit and dense clusters of small, pinkish-white flowers. Its ornamental value makes it a popular choice for rock gardens and dry landscapes.
